title: The Pale King's Wake (3P)
description: A 3-player adaptation of the psychological thriller. 15 years ago, you made a pact. Now it's time to pay.

public_embed.title: üêä The Hunting Lodge
public_embed.description:
Louisiana. The air is thick enough to drown in. It smells of rot, sulfur, and cheap bourbon.

You've all returned to the scene of the crime. The Blackwood Hunting Lodge.

**The Detective** swirls his flask. He buried the evidence here 15 years ago.
**The Scholar** adjusts their glasses. They know the ritual was real.
**The Criminal** cracks his knuckles. He remembers the violence. He liked it.

A single cassette tape sits on the table.
public_embed.captionOfImage: A decrepit wooden hunting lodge sinking into a swamp, spanish moss hanging from dead cypress trees, thick fog, sepia tone, gritty cinematic texture

public_embed.title: üìº The Recording
public_embed.description:
You press play. Statistical hiss, then a voice. *Your* voice, from 15 years ago.

*"We do this together. We bleed the King, we bury the bodies, and we never speak of it again."*

The tape clicks off.

Someone broke the pact. Someone talked.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Close up of an old dusty cassette player on a scarred wooden table, flies buzzing around it, high contrast noir lighting

public_embed.title: üì± Silent Vibrations
public_embed.description:
Phones light up in pockets. Private messages. Accusations.

Look at your teammates. Who looks guilty?
public_embed.captionOfImage: Three people sitting in a dark room looking at each other with suspicion, dramatic shadows obscuring their eyes

content.text:
üïµÔ∏è **Internal Monologue:**

The Criminal is twitchy. He's going to crack. If he does, you go to jail. Put him down first if you have to.

üëä **Internal Monologue:**

The Scholar is looking at you like you're trash. Like they did back then. Don't let them sell you out.

üß† **Internal Monologue:**

Fascinating. The group dynamic is collapsing exactly as Father predicted. The Detective is hiding something.

public_embed.title: üßπ Cleaning House
public_embed.description:
You can't trust each other, but you have work to do. The scene must be scrubbed.

**Team Woods (Criminal):** Go burn the old ritual effigies.
**Team Archives (Detective & Scholar):** Go to the basement. Destroy the records.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Two paths diverging in a swamp, one leading into dark dense woods, the other leading down into a concrete storm cellar

public_embed.title: üå≤ The Sticks
public_embed.description:
The group watches as the **Criminal** heads into the tree line alone.

The woods are silent. Too silent.

He finds the effigies. Stick figures made of driftwood and bone.

Wait. One of them is wearing a tie. **The Detective's tie.**

"Someone's been watching us," the Criminal grunts.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Creepy stick figures hanging from trees in a swamp, wearing modern clothing, fog swirling

public_embed.title: üî• Fire and Dirt
public_embed.description:
He needs to burn them. But he spots fresh disturbed earth nearby. Shaped like a shallow grave.

It matches the spot where you buried the girl 15 years ago.
public_embed.captionOfImage: A rusty shovel blade covered in fresh mud, pointed at the camera, tense confrontation

choices.label: Ignore it and burn the sticks

public_embed.title: üï≥Ô∏è Empty
public_embed.description:
He digs. Sweating. Panting.

The hole is empty.

The body is gone. Or someone moved it.

*The scene shifts to the basement...*
public_embed.captionOfImage: An empty muddy hole in the ground, rain filling it up, despair

public_embed.title: üî• Ashes to Ashes
public_embed.description:
The fire catches. The effigies scream as the sap boils. It sounds human.

He turns his back on the grave. Some things are better left buried.

*The scene shifts to the basement...*
public_embed.captionOfImage: Bonfire in the woods, distorting shadows, sparks flying up into the dark canopy

public_embed.title: üóÑÔ∏è Paper Trails
public_embed.description:
Meanwhile, the **Detective** and **Scholar** descend into the basement.

It smells of mildew and old secrets.

The Detective finds the ledger. It documents the bribes.

But the Scholar finds something else. A VHS tape labeled **"Patient Session: The Detective - 2024"**.

That was yesterday.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Stacks of old VHS tapes and rotting cardboard boxes, a single tape labeled clearly in marker

public_embed.title: üì∫ To Play or Destroy?
public_embed.description:
The Detective lunges for the tape. "That's private!"

The Scholar holds it back. "Why were you recording sessions? Are you the leak?"
public_embed.captionOfImage: A hand clutching a VHS tape tightly, another hand reaching for it, conflict

public_embed.title: üìº The Leak
public_embed.description:
Static. Then the Detective's voice playing from the VCR.

*"I can't take the guilt anymore. I'm going to turn myself in. I'm going to take them all down with me."*

The Detective freezes. "I... I was drunk."

But now the Scholar knows.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Old CRT TV screen showing static noise in a dark room

public_embed.title: üôà Ignorance is Bliss
public_embed.description:
The Scholar smashes the tape. Spools of magnetic ribbon spill out like guts.

"We're a team," the Scholar says smoothly. "I protect your secrets. You protect mine."
public_embed.captionOfImage: Tangled magnetic tape on a concrete floor, destroyed plastic pieces

public_embed.title: ü•É Drink Up
public_embed.description:
Everyone converges in the living room.

The Criminal is covered in mud. The Detective looks pale.

Suddenly, the power cuts. The generator out back has died.

"I'll fix it," the Criminal growls. He heads out the back door.
"I need my meds," the Scholar mutters, heading to the bathroom.

The Detective is left alone in the dark.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Pitch black room with only the glowing embers of a cigarette visible

public_embed.title: ‚ö° The Fracture
public_embed.description:
Chaos reigns. The group splinters.

**The Criminal:** Goes to check the generator.
**The Scholar:** Goes to find pills.
**The Detective:** Left with his thoughts.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Image fractured into three shards, each showing a different nightmare scenario

public_embed.title: üì¶ The Punishment Box
public_embed.description:
Outside, the **Criminal** is hit hard. WHAM.

He wakes up crammed into a wooden box. Buried alive. A breathing tube sticks up.

This is the old punishment box. The air is running out.
public_embed.captionOfImage: First person view of wooden planks inches from face, dirt falling through cracks, claustrophobic

public_embed.title: ü©∏ Freedom hurts
public_embed.description:
SNAP. The pain is blinding. But his hand slides free.

The Criminal claws his way out of the dirt, gasping for air.

He's alive. And he knows who put him there.
public_embed.captionOfImage: A bloody hand bursting out of grave soil into the moonlight

public_embed.title: ‚ò†Ô∏è No One is Coming
public_embed.description:
He screams until his throat bleeds. No one comes.

The air gets thin.

The Criminal passes out, buried in the dark.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Total black screen

public_embed.title: üíä The Dosage
public_embed.description:
In the bathroom, the **Scholar** reaches for pills. But the bottle is wrong. The label says **"TRUTH"**.

A hallucination takes hold.

The walls start to breathe. The Scholar sees HIM. The Pale King, standing in the mirror.
public_embed.captionOfImage: A face in a mirror that isn't yours, wearing a yellow crown, distorted reality

public_embed.title: üëë Analysis Complete
public_embed.description:
They put on the mask. Suddenly, the world makes sense.

Time is a flat circle. They've done this before. They'll do it again.

The Scholar giggles. It's a hungry sound.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Abstract spiral symbol glowing yellow on a black background

public_embed.title: üß† Clarity
public_embed.description:
Smash. Glass flies.

The hallucination ends. The Scholar is bleeding, but sane.

They know what needs to be done.
public_embed.captionOfImage: Shard of mirror reflecting a frightened eye

public_embed.title: üìû The Badge
public_embed.description:
Inside, the **Detective** stares at his badge. He could end this now. Call his precinct.

Or he could trust his team.

**Internal Monologue:** "They're damaged goods. But they're YOUR damaged goods."
public_embed.captionOfImage: A tarnished police badge sitting on a table under a single lightbulb

public_embed.title: üî´ The Pale King Arrives
public_embed.description:
The team reassembles in the main hall. Muddy. Bleeding. High.

The front door opens. A figure steps in wearing the antlered mask of the Pale King.

He takes off the mask.

It's **Father Blackwood**. The dead cult leader. He didn't die. He's been waiting.
public_embed.captionOfImage: A gaunt old man holding a terrifying deer-skull mask, framed by lightning

public_embed.title: üîö The Final Choice
public_embed.description:
**Father Blackwood:** "My children. You've suffered enough. Join me again, or die like dogs."

**The Detective** raises his gun.
**The Scholar** whispers a prayer.
**The Criminal** tightens his fist.
public_embed.captionOfImage: First person view of a revolver barrel aimed at the old man, hands shaking

public_embed.title: üö¨ The Tax Man
public_embed.description:
BANG.

Blackwood drops. The Detective smokes the barrel.

"Debt paid," he says.

You burn the lodge down. You walk away. The darkness is still there, but you're not carrying it alone anymore.

**Ending: The Clean Slate**
public_embed.captionOfImage: Three figures walking away from a massive inferno, backs to the camera, slow motion style

public_embed.title: üëë Long Live The King
public_embed.description:
BANG. BANG. BANG.

Bodies hit the floor. The Survivor kneels.

Father Blackwood smiles. "Welcome home."

Time is a flat circle.

**Ending: The New Circle**
public_embed.captionOfImage: Pools of blood on wooden floorboards forming a ritual symbol

public_embed.title: ‚öñÔ∏è The Truth
public_embed.description:
You drop the guns. You call the cops.

You all go to jail. For a long time.

But for the first time in 15 years... you sleep soundly.

**Ending: Penance**
public_embed.captionOfImage: Sunlight streaming through iron bars, peaceful dust motes
